name: human-os
description: Context & Knowledge Graph Service - Central infrastructure for identity, context, and AI integration

scripts.eval: npx promptfoo eval -c evals/sculptor/promptfooconfig.yaml -c evals/voice/promptfooconfig.yaml -c evals/tutorial/promptfooconfig.yaml -c evals/production/promptfooconfig.yaml -c evals/assessment/promptfooconfig.yaml -c evals/renubu/promptfooconfig.yaml
scripts.eval:ci: npx promptfoo eval --no-cache --output evals/results.json -c evals/sculptor/promptfooconfig.yaml -c evals/voice/promptfooconfig.yaml -c evals/tutorial/promptfooconfig.yaml -c evals/production/promptfooconfig.yaml -c evals/assessment/promptfooconfig.yaml -c evals/renubu/promptfooconfig.yaml
